about_the_game:
This soundtrack contains 35 original songs composed by the developer, Daijyobi Institute, for the game Holy Knight Luviria.

Featured Tracks:


1. Opening Title
2. Ancient Demon King
3. Place of the Seal
4. Hope
5. Charge!
6. Forest of the Lost Souls
7. Standard Battle Theme ~ Fanfare
8. St. Tranquillo Temple
9. Forest of the Lost Souls
10. The Witch and the Forest
11. Crimson Knight Order Theme
12. The Demon King and the Hole Knight
13. Da Capo Castle
14. With the Captain
15. Pesante Underground Path
16. Battle with Holy Knight Luviria
17. Indignation
18. Lifria's Theme
19. Determination
20. Invasion ~Marciale~
21. Location Secured
22. Devil Tia's Theme
23. Fuuko Volcanic Caves
24. Wayland's Smithy
25. Forest of the Spirits
26. Ben Marcato Valley
27. Mabiya Crystal Cave
28. Hero
29. Invasion ~Harbor City Forza~
30. Abandoned Mine Encore
31. Hasadrea
32. Former Capital Stretta
33. Fallen Holy Knight
34. The Power of God
35. Athletic Competition
